name: Dome 2.0
description:
Android is free !!!

Demo Above !!!

Dome 2.0 Is a Top down survival space shooter game. In the game has two modes.

An endless mode; your goal is to beat your high score.

Lvel mode: You'll be given a mission or task and you have to finish it before proceeding to the next level.

Do you have what it takes to survive.

CONTROLS

PC

W or left  to move

Space to shoot

Move mouse cursor to rotate player and aim.

CONTROLLER

PS for PlayStation

Move - PS (X)  Xbox (Y)

Shoot : L1

Use joystick to rotate and aim

NOTE.

The free apk has ads in it to make it free. Check the demo section. It ain't a demo but that's the only way to make it free

Here's a video of how I made the game


If you have any bug reports and stuff drop them in the comments.

Thanks for playing

Have Fun😁✌🏽
